definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: The vegetable farmers space out the Chinese cabbage about 30cm apart.
sentences.chinese: 菜農每隔約30公分種一顆大白菜。

sentences.english: The current vegetable price slump has taken its toll on Chinese farmers.
sentences.chinese: 近日蔬菜價格暴跌使廣大的中國菜農損失慘重。

sentences.english: We all know how to plant vegetables for my father was once a vegetable grower.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道怎麼種菜，因爲爸爸曾經是菜農。

sentences.english: In my small, even the vegetable farmers in Shanghai suburbs, we all shout Ah Heung.
sentences.chinese: 在我小的時候，連上海郊區的菜農，我們都喊阿鄉。

sentences.english: The then 14-year-old daughter of vegetable farmers had little choice in the matter.
sentences.chinese: 當時這個十四歲的菜農的女兒在這件事上沒什麼選擇。

sentences.english: Jiang Haihong is a vegetable farmer in Yu Zhong county, in northwestern Gansu Province.
sentences.chinese: 蔣海宏是中國西北甘肅省榆中縣的一名菜農。

sentences.english: Vegetable prices rise during the journey from producer to consumer.
sentences.chinese: 在由菜農到消費者的環節中，蔬菜價格水漲船高。

definition: Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
Suining county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
pinyin: Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: twisted roots and intertwined joints (idiom); complicated and very tricky/knotty and deeply-rooted difficulties
